  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void connectToDb​(int direction)
    Connects program to the database Gets and inserts user data from boxes to database also retrieves certain data depending on the direction.
    void initialize()
    Initializes the database with previous data fills ItemType boxes with data options also allows user to enter their own values.
    void loadName​(int productid, ProductionRecord record)
    The loadName method for setting the product name from the product's ID.
    void setupTable()
    setupTable method to set up the columns of produce tab and set the items of productLine to both tableView + listView.
    void updateTxt()
    updateTxt method to update the textarea of proLog with recorded records in productionRun.

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Initializes the database with previous data fills ItemType boxes with data options also allows user to enter their own values.

    • connectToDb

      public void connectToDb​(int direction)
      Connects program to the database Gets and inserts user data from boxes to database also retrieves certain data depending on the direction.
      Parameters:
      direction - - to define what is required with the databases returns void

      updateTxt method to update the textarea of proLog with recorded records in productionRun.

      Parameters:
      productid - - ID from the product
      record - - the instance of the ProductionRecord class returns void
